content.rendered:
Directed by Gonzalo Amat. Ernesto Contreras. Hiromi Kamata

Written by Aura García-Junco. Augusto Mendoza. Rodrigo Santos. Paco Ignacio Taibo II

Cast Luis Gerardo Méndez( Hector Belascoaran Shayne3 episodes, 2022 ). Paulina Gaitan( Irene3 episodes, 2022 ). Silverio Palacios( Gilberto Gomez Letras3 episodes, 2022 ). Irene Azuela( Elisa Belascoaran Shayne3 episodes, 2022 ). Enrique Arreola( Frederico Paniagua3 episodes, 2022 ). Manuel Poncelis( Vocero Don Eulogio1 episode, 2022 ). Cuauhtli Jiménez( Renato Barrera1 episode, 2022 ). Arturo Beristáin( Tabaquero1 episode, 2022 ). Mayra Serbulo( Betty Gomez Letras1 episode, 2022 ). Jero Medina( Policia1 episode, 2022 ). Jacobo Lieberman( Licenciado Bernal1 episode, 2022 ). Gabriela Cartol( Joven Victima 11 episode, 2022 ). Nora Isabel Huerta( Empleada Tintoreria1 episode, 2022 ). Norma Pablo( Senora Ofendida1 episode, 2022 ). Carlos Segura( Jeronimo1 episode, 2022 ). Sergio Rued( Perito 11 episode, 2022 ). Joaquín Chablé( Perito 21 episode, 2022 ). Sandra Debelak( Professora Hilda1 episode, 2022 ). Jorge Echeguren( Locutor Noticia1 episode, 2022 ). Frank Forke( Guardia Embajada1 episode, 2022 ). Gerardo Martinez( Huesero1 episode, 2022 ). Andrés Weiss( Turista Aleman Hombre1 episode, 2022 ). Jessica Mueller( Turista Aleman Mujer1 episode, 2022 ). Alejandrina Hergon( Edecan Autodromo1 episode, 2022 ). Sandra Cecilia( Muchacha Pulqueria1 episode, 2022 ). Sebastian Schor( Vox Manual de Detective1 episode, 2022 ). Alicia Pineda( Secretaria Bernal1 episode, 2022 ). Antón Araiza( Hombre Parque1 episode, 2022 ). Adrián Carreón( Joven Parque1 episode, 2022 ). Eduardo Ruy( Comentarista Autodromo1 episode, 2022 ). Christian Cortés( Cocinero Embajada1 episode, 2022 ). Maria Patricia Rivera( Taquillera Trenes1 episode, 2022 ). Teofilo Victor Perez Ramirez( Rotulista1 episode, 2022 ). Jaime Torres( Mesero Embajada Alemana1 episode, 2022 ). José Carlos Calderón( Ranchero1 episode, 2022 ). Luciana Valle Garcia( Irene Nina1 episode, 2022 ). Victor Hugo Uribe( Mecanico1 episode, 2022 ). Luis de la Mora( Juez Autodromo1 episode, 2022 ). Clementina Guadarrama( Doña Solda1 episode, 2022 ). Macarena García Romero( Virginiaunknown episodes ). Mildred Motta( Laura Camposantounknown episodes ). Francisco Calvillo( Leobardo El Romanounknown episodes).

Language Spanish

Producers Julián de Tavira. Alexis Fridman. Rodrigo Santos. Juan Uruchurtu. Héctor Villegas

Production Perro Azul.

Certificate 15+

Official site Netflix Site

Season 1

Total Episodes 3
